author: Special Correspondent
text:
In need:Women from Meenakshipuram and CN village waiting at Tirunelveli District Collectorate to submit their petetion seeking old age pension.— Photo: A. SHAIKMOHIDEEN

Seeking monthly old age pension, over 30 senior citizens from Meenakshipuram and C.N. Village near Tirunelveli Junction came to the Collectorate and submitted petitions to Collector M. Karunakaran on Tuesday.

Dr. Karunakaran, who came down from his chamber to meet the senior citizens at the portico, received petitions from them. “Your applications will be scrutinized immediately and all eligible persons given the old age pension,” the Collector assured them.

Accompanying the senior citizens, Mayor E. Bhuvaneshwari, who hails from Meenakshipuram area, said most of the applicants seeking monthly old age pension from Meenakshipuram and C.N. Village were from the below poverty line families and abandoned by their children.

Abandoned

“Though the children of some of the applicants are drawing decent monthly salary they have abandoned their parents and hence they are battling with poverty. Hence, the monthly assistance will be of great help to them,” Ms. Bhuvaneshwari said.
title: Senior citizens seek old age pension
